unnormalised: Tunchya Pillanchi Gun Vakhyani Samazpachi: Palakank Hazir Ek Margdarshak
normalised: Tujea Bhurgeachea Markanchem Gyaan: Amchi Vat Vhoddilank

unnormalised: Palak mhunn, amkam amchya pilankhatir ut'tom zai asta, ani shikxanantli karyakshemta ek mahatvachi bab zait geliya. Te report cardanche mazyat postanchim ani grade bharun astata tenna te samazun ghevop ek bhulbhulayen bharlolo dista. Tumchea pillanche shikxanantlim rezultant, Indian shikxonn pod'dhitint koxem samazun ghevnk zata tem ani tanchem interpret koxem korunk zata tem hanv tumkam sangtam, tum tanchea ut'tom panthak adhar divnk xoktat.
normalised: Amhi vat vhoddil mhunn, amkam amchea bhurgeak sobest zai, ani shikxonik pradarshana hea vishayant amchi chintna asta. Zata ki porikxechea patrikechi tolna korunk zata, ani ankde ani grade bharlya vellar konnanchi vat dukhi asta. Ami fuddarak korta ki bharti shikxonik vyavasthent tujea bhurgeache shikxonik parinam samjun ani tolna korun tuka tanka probhavi rupan maddad karunk zata.

unnormalised: Poilech, Bharotant choltat tea veg-vegllea grading pod'dhatiche mhaiti gheiat. Kitlyaoxech schoolan CBSE pattern follow kartat, zalear kitek ICSE vo state boardachi syllabi vapurtat. Ek school A1 E2 vorvim grades dit, dusream A to F vorvim grades dit. Eka pod'dhitint 85% gun mele tor A grade mhunn mantat, zalear dusrea pod'dhitint B+ mhunn mantat. Report cardache sangata schoolachi grading key ditat ti samazun gheun pod'dotichem margdarshan korumchi.
normalised: Pahilech, Bharti dhorman asleli veg-veglik grade yogyota samjun ghyat. Kiteak ki zaitea xallant C-B-S-E pattern vaparta, dusrea I-C-S-E vha state board syllabus vaprun yeta. Ek-ekant, grade vyavasta vegli asta. Udharan dita ki ek xalla A ek te E don grade dita, zalear dusri sadi A te F vaporunk xekta. Eka vyavasthent eksi panch panni zatat mhunn taka A grade diunk zata, zalear dusrea vyavasthent taka B plus mahntat. Sodanch xallenche nirdesh ani grade patrika vaporunk zata.

unnormalised: Postanchim mahatvachim suchovnk zata. Postanchim 60% mhunnlear poilem division mhunn mantat, zalear 50% gun dusrea divisionak dikhavtat. 75% voir aslelear ut'tom mhunn mantat. Punn, tumcho bhavarth fattim zavnchona. Visheancho vixex koxe astale ani tumchea pillanchim takod kitli aasa ti polleiat. 65% gun Mathsant aslelear tem 70% gun tumchea pillak unne axil'lea vixexant melltelea gunank porjek mellunk xokta.
normalised: Ankde ek mahatvacho suchak asa. Eksi sath panni zatat mhunn pahilo vibhag asa, ani panni panni mhunn dusro vibhag dakhoyta. Eksi ponchattar panni mhunn sarkech mahatvacho asa. Punn, amchem laksha fakt ankdyar asun zaina. Vichar karyavishay mhushkel ani tujea bhurgeachi takat vaporunk zata. Eksi sat panni ganitat mhunn sobest astolo ki eksi sattar panni tujea bhurgeak odhik mhushkel vishayant mellunk zata.

unnormalised: Fokot porjek poddant axil'lea postanchim porjek vochuk vochonaka. Ekek visheache gun polleiat. Tumchen pilan Scienceant sodanch unne gun melltollear, 45/100 mhunnlear, tankam ekstra helpachi zaroor asa ani dusri learning pod'dhot vaprunk zai podta. Tankam kutlean madad korunk zata techodakhi kortalelear tuturing vorvim, kitlixeo vostu vorvim, vo kitli xem pod'dak ekcharan tem melloun ghevnk xoktat.
normalised: Fakta eka andazache ankdyar laksha diunakat. Eka-eka vishayant kite mellayla te pashyat. Tujea bhurgeache sadan viggyanak nyun zata, mhunn eksi ponchalli ekshant mhunn tanka odhik maddad diunk yeta. Hea vishayank olkhun tuka vatevharan maddad diunk yeta, mhunn adhartat ki maddad korun, odhik vostu vaporun, va sadan mellun vevlokho vaprun zata.

unnormalised: Tumchea pillanchem adlem performanca ani atanchem performanca ekmekak tulna korunk. Tumchea pillanche gun vaddlet vo kam zale? Englishint 90% gun melltololean 78% gunak podonaka, tem kosle khatir zalam tem samajun ghevnk, tem increased workload vo vixex topicant unnem samazlem tor zaunk xokta. Zalea dusrea vatten 55% te 68% gunak vaddonaka, tem vaddichem ani proyatnachem chinha.
normalised: Tujea bhurgeachi chikitsa ani agli chikitsa tulna kar. Sudhartai va khali zata kai? Eksi nav panni te eksi sattatari panni inglesak nyun zata mhunn ulo diunk zata, mhunn kamacho bhar vaddonk vo eka vishayak mhushkel zata. Ullati, eksi ponchponn panni te eksi anthatari panni ek sudharta ani prayatna dakhoyta.

unnormalised: Ugddas dovorat, tumchea pillanchem voktik vikasanthim gun voktik dishtti vortoutat. Ek vaddicho vichar tutlavat. Gunanchem fokot uchhar korop poros proyatnachem uchhar korop, shikxonnakhatir tankam khup faido dita. Eka vidhyarthyache gun 70% astali punn to proyatn kartalo tor to eka vidhyarthyapromannuch zaata, to 90% gun mellounta punn torui to proyatn korunk sodhina.
normalised: Yad dhar ki, chikitsak parinam tujea bhurgeache ek vikas dakhoyta. Udhan vikasacher dhyaan dharat. Prayatna ani udyogachi mahima kara, punn fakt markacher dhyaan diunakat, mhunn shikxonnache lakshant probhav podunk zata. Eka vidhyarthyak eksi sattar panni mellata punn to vhoddya udyogacher dhyaan dita, sarkech vhodd mhunn disonk zata ki konnakui eksi nav panni mellata.

unnormalised: Nimannim, tumchea pillanchea xikxakanchim gollyant zait ravat. Palak-xikxakanchi meetingak vochat ani tumchea doubts aslelear tankam vicharat. Tumchea pillanchem learning style, takod, ani kutle vikasanthim zaroor asa te xikxak sangonk xoktat. Udaharnak, eka xikxakan sanglear, tumchea pillanche gun 72% aile, punn te class discussionsant aktif kartat, mhunnlear tankam vixex zaati thavn samazle mhunn dakhotat. Ugddas dovrat, tumi, xikxak, ani tumchea pillak ek team mhunn kaam korchem podta, tankam tanchem shikxanant poddanti zoddchi ani bori jivanchi bheti mellovnk zai.
normalised: Nimannem, tujea bhurgeache gurunche kodden uloy. Vhoddil-gurunchea mellavak vochunk va tumi ulo diunakat tumkam dubhav zata. Guru tumchea bhurgeachem shikxonnachem prakar, takat, ani sudharpa vishayant gyaan diunk xekta. Udharan dita ki, guru tanka eksi sattatari panni likhita porikxent mellata, tanka chalu vargant bhag gheunk zata, mhunn vishayachi takat dakhoyta. Yad dhar, tumi, guru, ani tujea bhurgya ek sangat asa, tanka shikxonik shakti mellounk ani sobhit jivitant maddad karunk zata.
